alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 8:44AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Showers and gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern Trumbull, eastern Ashtabula, Erie and Crawford Counties through 945 AM EST... At 843 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Girard to near Orwell to near Ravenna. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Conneaut, Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, North East, Union City, Girard, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Andover, Linesville, Wattsburg, Adamsville, Pymatuning Central, Riceville, Harmonsburg and Guys Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
